comment.caption: Mary Jane Truman at the well on the Truman Farm
comment.note: One of a series of photos from Mary Jane Truman's Christmas Album, 1906. Mary Jane Truman(right) and two unidentified women at the well on the Truman Farm. Caption says "A Cup of Cold Water." From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, daughter of Vivian Truman.
